text: welcome to the 2014 detroit auto show
here's my guide to some of this year's
hottest trends car makers are
continually innovating and we're hearing
a lot more talk about lightweight
materials take the f-150 truck it's been
on an extreme diet the steel body has
been replaced with aluminium and it's
lost a whopping seven hundred pounds
while the f-150 truck is all about
getting better fuel efficiency there's
plenty here for those looking for power
and performance the beating heart of
this lexus RCF is a 5-liter v8 engine
with more than 450 horsepower and for
something a little different have a look
at this electric smart bike it really is
something to suit all tastes at this
year's detroit auto show
